summary: Adds a convenient building outside of the city of Whiterun that includes many chests for a player to store his or her supplies in an organized manner. It also includes some items for the most suitable comfort as well as a map marker to fast travel to.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a convenient building outside of the city of Whiterun that includes many chests for a player to store his or her supplies in an organized manner. It includes some items for the most suitable comfort as well as a map marker to fast travel to. (See image for map location) This is also my first mod, so constructive criticism is appreciated! Comment to let me know if I should add anything special. I also use many mods, so my pictures may look somewhat different than yours.


Installation: Extract the .esb file to your C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data folder or use the Nexus Mod Manager. If you prefer Steam Workshop, you can check it out here: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=13041.


Versions:
0.3: Changed name to \"Whiterun Depot\" for more immersion and added a video of the mod.
0.2: New lighting and clutter added; functional bed, more mounts, banner, rugs, and more added to add more of a \"comfort\" feeling.
0.1: Initial launch


Known issues: This has happened to me twice so far but isn\'t much of a problem. I experienced the outside of the area disappear (the house), but the two doors were still there, so the area could still be accessed. In the end, I might have to end up moving the location of the building because I think that the cause of this is the big rock the building is merged into. Comment if you find any other problems.


Video: Click on the \"video\" tab or watch it here on Youtube:  video, http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lCgboV0vEys&feature=youtu.be
author: Guitarshredder12
